testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join countless happy users showcasing their creativity with our Collage Maker

items.name: Emma Roberts
items.comment: Creating collages has never been easier! I'm thrilled with how my memories came together.

items.name: John Smith
items.comment: As a teacher, I use this tool to create fun projects that my students love. Highly recommended!

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about the Collage Maker

items.title: What types of images can I use?
items.description: You can upload JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Mix images of different sizes for creative results.

items.title: Is there a limit to how many photos I can use?
items.description: Yes, you can upload up to 20 images for each collage, allowing for an expansive layout.

items.title: Can I edit my collages after creation?
items.description: Currently, edits can only be made before creating the collage. Re-upload for adjustments.

items.title: How does privacy protection work?
items.description: Your photos are processed directly in your browser, ensuring they never leave your device or get stored anywhere.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Your Collage?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and unleash your creativity. No sign-up required.
